General.Name: Dataproces Group A/S
General.Description: Dataproces Group A/S provides IT and consulting services for municipalities and their digital administration. The company offers automation and RPA, data analysis, and knowledge and competency solutions, as well as software solutions. It serves municipalities in the areas of citizen service, social and employment, children and teenagers, IT and digitization, technology and the environment, and economy and administration. Dataproces Group A/S was founded in 2011 and is based in Nibe, Denmark.

3.Name: Ms. Kristina  Koed
3.Title: Chief Operations Officer of Data Analysis
